list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Implement Discord refresh token support
The code has been updated to support refresh tokens from Discord. Additionally, there's also an optimized check for already downloaded Modrinth mods which should improve the efficiency of mod checking. A few minor logged messages during mod download process have also been adjusted for clarity.

task.summary: Temporarily disable websocket and http stuff, to prevent issues.

Update package and improve plugin handling
Added new dependencies in package files and updated java paths. Also implemented functions to handle Spigot plugins and Modrinth plugins more efficiently. Furthermore, introduced error handling mechanisms to deal with plugin sources not found or when encountering unknown download sources. New files were created to accommodate these changes, ensuring code organization and readability.

Refactor writeToFile function and improve plugin handling
The writeToFile function in filesystem.ts was refactored to better handle buffers and error handling. Plugin handling was also improved in index.ts, including error checking during copying and support for manual plugins. Lastly, the Spigot API call was fixed in spigot.ts.

Clear cached plugins before download
This commit removes the clearCachedPlugins function from the initialisation file and calls it in the downloadPlugins function. The purpose is to ensure that old cached plugins are cleared before new ones are downloaded.

Improve mod downloading and syncing process
This update improves the mod downloading and syncing process by removing existing server mods, copying new ones and manually added ones. It ensures the deletion of old mods andl adds or updates mod files to the server directory as necessary. Furthermore, it also includes dependency checking for each downloaded mod and provides informative logging during the mod downloading process.

Update packages dependencies
Several packages were updated, added, or removed. Notably, the `luxon` package was updated to version 3.4.4, and `archiver` was added. The `@babel/helper-string-parser` and `@babel/runtime` packages were also updated among others for overall enhancement of the project.

Implement Discord refresh token support
The code has been updated to support refresh tokens from Discord. Additionally, there's also an optimized check for already downloaded Modrinth mods which should improve the efficiency of mod checking. A few minor logged messages during mod download process have also been adjusted for clarity.

MESSAGE.value: Temporarily disable websocket and http stuff, to prevent issues.

Update package and improve plugin handling
Added new dependencies in package files and updated java paths. Also implemented functions to handle Spigot plugins and Modrinth plugins more efficiently. Furthermore, introduced error handling mechanisms to deal with plugin sources not found or when encountering unknown download sources. New files were created to accommodate these changes, ensuring code organization and readability.

Improve code quality and add Qodana linter
This commit refactors the writeToFile function and improves plugin handling while making certain configurations in the workspace.xml file. A new Qodana linter configuration is also added for better code analysis. Moreover, the task related to clearing cached plugins is now moved to the downloadPlugins function for better code organization.

Refactor writeToFile function and improve plugin handling
The writeToFile function in filesystem.ts was refactored to better handle buffers and error handling. Plugin handling was also improved in index.ts, including error checking during copying and support for manual plugins. Lastly, the Spigot API call was fixed in spigot.ts.

Clear cached plugins before download
This commit removes the clearCachedPlugins function from the initialisation file and calls it in the downloadPlugins function. The purpose is to ensure that old cached plugins are cleared before new ones are downloaded.

Improve mod downloading and syncing process
This update improves the mod downloading and syncing process by removing existing server mods, copying new ones and manually added ones. It ensures the deletion of old mods andl adds or updates mod files to the server directory as necessary. Furthermore, it also includes dependency checking for each downloaded mod and provides informative logging during the mod downloading process.

Update packages dependencies
Several packages were updated, added, or removed. Notably, the `luxon` package was updated to version 3.4.4, and `archiver` was added. The `@babel/helper-string-parser` and `@babel/runtime` packages were also updated among others for overall enhancement of the project.

Implement Discord refresh token support
The code has been updated to support refresh tokens from Discord. Additionally, there's also an optimized check for already downloaded Modrinth mods which should improve the efficiency of mod checking. A few minor logged messages during mod download process have also been adjusted for clarity.
